segments.en: “Mendicants, three things are conveyed under cover, not in the open.

segments.pli: Mātugāmo, bhikkhave, paṭicchanno āvahati, no vivaṭo;
segments.en: Females are married with a veil, not unveiled.

segments.pli: brāhmaṇānaṃ, bhikkhave, mantā paṭicchannā āvahanti, no vivaṭā;
segments.en: Brahmin hymns are conveyed under cover, not openly.

segments.pli: micchādiṭṭhi, bhikkhave, paṭicchannā āvahati, no vivaṭā.
segments.en: Wrong view is conveyed under cover, not in the open.

segments.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi paṭicchannāni āvahanti, no vivaṭāni.
segments.en: These three things are conveyed under cover, not in the open.

segments.pli: Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, vivaṭāni virocanti, no paṭicchannāni.
segments.en: Three things shine in the open, not under cover.

segments.pli: Candamaṇḍalaṃ, bhikkhave, vivaṭaṃ virocati, no paṭicchannaṃ;
segments.en: The moon shines in the open, not under cover.

segments.pli: sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ, bhikkhave, vivaṭaṃ virocati, no paṭicchannaṃ;
segments.en: The sun shines in the open, not under cover.

segments.pli: tathāgatappavedito dhammavinayo, bhikkhave, vivaṭo virocati, no paṭicchanno.
segments.en: The teaching and training proclaimed by a Realized One shine in the open, not under cover.

segments.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi vivaṭāni virocanti, no paṭicchannānī”ti.
segments.en: These three things shine in the open, not under cover.”
